trans-unit.source: Defines the different language versions of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 定義西曆的不同語言版本。

trans-unit.source: The date and time patterns associated with the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> vary depending on the language.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間的模式與相關聯<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>語言而異。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> is selected in <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, GregorianCalendarTypes can be used to specify which date and time patterns to use in that <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>已選取、 <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>GregorianCalendarTypes 可以用來指定要用於該<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>的日期和時間模式</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>的

trans-unit.source: For Arabic cultures, more language versions of the Gregorian calendar are available.
trans-unit.target: 多個語言版本的西曆阿拉伯文文化特性中，皆可。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the French version of <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> using the MiddleEastFrench value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用法文版的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>使用 MiddleEastFrench 值。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: A culture that supports <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> might not support all language versions of <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>可能不支援<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>.</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>的所有語言版本</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>所支援文化特性

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties specify the calendars supported by that culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性會指定該文化特性所支援的行事曆。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> is supported, <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.CalendarType%2A> can be used to determine which language versions of <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> are supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>支援，<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.CalendarType%2A>可用來判斷哪一個語言版本的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>支援。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.CalendarType%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: Refers to the Arabic version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 參考阿拉伯文西曆的版本。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the localized version of the Gregorian calendar, based on the language of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that uses the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 指的是西曆<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo><xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>使用的</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>語言為基礎的當地語系化版本

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the Middle East French version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 是指中東法文版的西曆。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the transliterated English version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 是指音譯英文西曆的版本。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the transliterated French version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 是指音譯法文西曆的版本。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the U.S. English version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 指的是在美國太平洋時區西曆的英文版。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
